channel.title: Sides on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Sides on Docs

item.title: Pico De Gallo Recipe
item.description: Enjoy the fresh and vibrant flavors of Pico de Gallo with this simple recipe. It’s a perfect accompaniment to tacos, burritos, or as a zesty topping for any Mexican dish. Ingredients 4 medium ripe tomatoes, diced 1/2 cup finely chopped red onion 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice 1 jalapeno pepper, finely chopped (seeds and membranes removed for a milder flavor) 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt Instructions In a mixing bowl, combine the diced tomatoes, red onion, chopped cilantro, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, and salt.

item.title: Guacamole Recipe
item.description: Perfect as a dip or topping for your favorite Mexican dishes. Ingredients 2 ripe Hass avocados 1/4 cup diced red onion 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt 1/4 teaspoon ground cumin 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder 1/2 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped (optional) Instructions Cut the avocados in half lengthwise and remove the pits. Scoop out the avocado flesh into a mixing bowl.
